description.originalText: Denise was originally hired as a companion for my 87 year old mother.   But she also took great care of my 90 year old dad who had dementia. For the last 2 years she has been a helpful companion to my mom by playing games or just sitting with her and talking.

description.displayText:
Denise was taking care of my 83 year old aunt on weekends who has lewy body dementia with Parkinson's.  This was not easy, Denise was a pro, she took care of my aunt, sang with her, entertained her and made sure she was comfortable. Denise put a smile on my aunts face.  My aunt felt comfortable with Denise as did my mom.  My aunt lives with my mom.
I would highly recommend Denise and will ask her if she is available as soon as I need someone.  Denise was always punctual and dependable.

description.displayText:
I hired Denise as a companion for my father. I would recommend Denise 100%,  as she is an extremely kind,  caring and compassionate person. 
Denise is very intelligent, insightful, genuine and trustworthy. In addition, she has a heart of gold and continues to follow up with me on my father's well- being.
description.originalText:
I hired Denise as a companion for my father. I would recommend Denise 100%,  as she is an extremely kind,  caring and compassionate person. 
Denise is very intelligent, insightful, genuine and trustworthy. In addition, she has a heart of gold and continues to follow up with me on my father's well- being.

description.displayText:
Dee has been taking care of my 93 year old mom for the past few months during the week in the afternoons.  Dee is a very pleasant person and is very dependable and super caring.  My mother has extreme mood swings due to dementia and Dee has been able to calm her down and relax her.
Throughout these mood swings Dee has been unflappable and has been in control of the situation.
We were very pleased to have Dee watch my mother.  Dee would be a valuable asset to any family that needs a warm, caring person for any type of care taking.
description.originalText:

description.displayText:
Dee took very good care of my 90 year old mom. She was always sweet and kind and very professional. Always positive and upbeat she made my mother's day so much better. She bathed her twice per week and made sure she had her lunch each day. There was light cleaning and laundry done once a week. Dee is personable and friendly and very flexible. She always went the extra mile. 

I would highly recommend Dee. Unfortunately my mom passed away and is no longer with us. I am happy that Dee was the one to care for her in her last days. It really made a tremendous difference to my mother and to our family to have someone so caring, gentle and kind to take care of her. 

Thank you so much for making those days so much better for all us. We wish Dee much success and happiness always.
